p: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.
q: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.
w: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.
e: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.
r: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.

blurd: As unpredictable as he is brutal, the dethroned reaver king Gangplank is feared far and wide. Once, he ruled the port city of Bilgewater, and while his reign is over, there are those who believe this has only made him more dangerous. Gangplank would see...
name: Gangplank
title: the Saltwater Scourge
